SKT_FIRST.name: Excuse Me!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000014_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000014_1_1] turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> 확률로 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>저주</color>를 부여합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、対象に<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>呪い</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。

SKT_SECOND.name: Welcome!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000014_2_1]</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000014_2_1] turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Let Me Serve You Tea!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000014_3_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000014_3_1] turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: お茶でもいかがですか!?
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> 확률로 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>저주</color>를 부여합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、対象に<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>呪い</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict Cursed on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000014_chain_1_1]</color> chance to inflict Cursed on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000014_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000014_backup_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000014_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 대상에게 저주를 부여합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>저주</color>를 부여합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、対象に<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で呪いを<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>呪い</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
